name: True or False (itch)
description:
Take this quiz to test you're factual knowledge and learn new facts on the way. Answer facts about geography, history, space and pop culture.

After what is Brazil named?  You will soon find out.

"I feel like I have gotten 248% smarter by playing this game" - Jacksepticeye(maybe one day)

"Best game of 1901" - Markeplier(probably a fabrication by the developer)

"Go to the corner" - My history teacher
